articles.author: Akash Dutta, Siddharth Suvarna
articles.title: Google Podcasts App Shutting Down On April 2, Users Asked to Move to YouTube Music | Technology News - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Google Podcasts app is going away, and users will no longer be able to listen to their favourite shows starting Tuesday, April 2, 2024. The Podcasts app now shows a message when opening the app highlighting that it will not be functional after the due date an…
